name: Note

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description:
Note corresponds to the target of skos:note. It contains an attributed literal that may include a language, format and, when appropriate,
				schema.

element.definition:
Note corresponds to the target of skos:note. It contains an attributed literal that may include a language, format and, when appropriate,
				schema.

element.name: assertedInCodeSystemVersion
element.short: the code system version that contains the assertion(s) represented in the Note
element.definition: the code system version that contains the assertion(s) represented in the Note

element.name: correspondingStatement
element.short: the URI of the Statement from which this note was derived
element.definition: the URI of the Statement from which this note was derived. This will only be present in services that support the Statement profile.

element.name: externalIdentifier
element.short: an external identifier assigned to this note by an outside party
element.definition: an external identifier assigned to this note by an outside party
